"Yo, how are you?": "You probably saw it, but it seems like they're holding an competition to test our abilities soon."
"They said it's just for relaxation and celebration, but there's probably more to it than that."
"Now that Dark Falz has returned, battles will become even more intense."
"So, I think they're also using this to select people for the coming war."
"...Well, that's just my opinion. That Huey's organizing it, so maybe we should take this at face value."
"Whatever the reason, challenging each other's abilities will encourage our growth. I would like to take part."
